DataElement.preferredDefinition: The [start] date of study treatment represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to exposure._The date on which the exposure begins.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2021-6-8 ak 12 Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 11/18/18 TT released/MC.  11-19-18 TT changed max length. 11/9/18 TT changed Data Type from Character to Date and added Max Length for NCI Implementation of the standard. Created as part of CDISC mapping task. 6.21.18 mc

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the start date of the study treatment administration using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date when constant dosing interval of the study treatment started or single administration occurred. When collecting the date for an individual dose, the word "start" may be omitted from the Question Text and Prompt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: EXSTDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH START DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable EXSTDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Template Text
CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 3028744 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 100
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the actual treatment start date?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the start date of blinatumomab bag being administered at onset date of SEPSIS?
